review_blob:
A nice IPA the way it should be.  All grapefruit and citrus nose and tastes.  Not perhaps the most pronounced of its style, but but a nice refresher and intro if youve only tried Keiths.

floral, grass, citrus, bubblegum, amber, clear, sparkling, medium bitterness, light sweetness, lightly sour, medium body, fizzy, lively, bitter,
beer_name: Double Trouble Hops and Robbers IPA

review_blob:
I really enjoy this as a refresher and my home pint when out at my local.   Theyve had it on tap for years and it is always a great drink.  Not the most interesting or challenging but beats the macros imho.  Refreshing goodness. 

cereal, floral, golden, pale, clear, medium bitterness, light sweetness, light body, thin feel, average carbonation.
